content: One, net revenue of $320 million, a 57% increase over Q3 last year with our retail channel up 61% and our e-commerce channel up 40% in the quarter, comp growth of 54.3% and demand comp growth of 15.8% and Net and comprehensive income increased 160% and adjusted EBITDA increased 87%. Key items from our third quarter 2022 income statement include net revenue of $320 million, comp growth of 54.3% and demand comp growth of 15.8% on a 1-year basis, 44.1% on a 2-year stacked basis and 87.8% on a 3-year stack basis.
